meanings.definition: Inflammation of the epididymis, typically due to infection.
meanings.sent1: After swimming in the cold pool, he developed epididymitis, causing swelling and pain in his testicles.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with epididymitis after he complained of discomfort in his groin area.
meanings.sent3: When the man tried to impress his friends with a backflip, he ended up with epididymitis, making him regret his acrobatic attempt.
meanings.sent4: The epididymitis was like a storm brewing in his scrotum, causing discomfort and worry.
meanings.sent5: The pain from epididymitis felt like a fiery dragon breathing its flames in his testicles.

meanings.definition: A painful condition affecting the testicles.
meanings.sent1: His epididymitis made it difficult for him to walk comfortably due to the sharp pain in his groin.
meanings.sent2: The athlete had to sit out of the game due to epididymitis causing him severe discomfort.
meanings.sent3: Despite the seriousness of the situation, his epididymitis made him walk like a penguin, bringing some unintentional humor.
meanings.sent4: The epididymitis felt like a heavy weight dragging down his spirits along with his testicles.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain of epididymitis was a constant reminder of his need for rest and recovery.
